mapper.select: select a.RESVE_SN, a.MBER_SN, a.RESVE_DT, a.RESVE_TIME, a.TRETMENT_NM, a.PROCESS_STTUS, a.REGIST_ID, a.REGIST_DT,( select MBER_NM from t_mber_m b where 1=1 and b.MBER_SN = a.MBER_SN ) AS mberNm from t_resve_m a where RESVE_SN = ${resveSn}

select a.RESVE_SN, a.MBER_SN, a.RESVE_DT, a.RESVE_TIME, a.TRETMENT_NM, a.PROCESS_STTUS, a.REGIST_ID, a.REGIST_DT,( select MBER_NM from t_mber_m b where 1=1 and b.MBER_SN = a.MBER_SN ) AS mberNm from t_resve_m a
mapper.insert:
select NEXTVAL(resve_seq) from dual
insert into t_resve_m (resve_sn, mber_sn, resve_dt, resve_time, tretment_nm, process_sttus, regist_id, regist_dt) values ( #{resveSn}, #{mberSn}, #{resveDt}, #{resveTime}, #{tretmentNm}, #{processSttus}, #{registId}, CURDATE() )
